name: You have made a sole application for a conditional order
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name)) 
Respondent: ((respondentname)) 
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

You have made a sole application on a conditional order. The other party has been notified. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: You have made a sole application for a conditional order
